function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on a single device for remote health monitoring","Impact":"Inaccurate monitoring and assessment of patient health leading to delayed intervention","Mitigation":"Use of multiple monitoring devices or periodic in-person check-ups to validate data from the wearable device","Technologies":"Integration of multiple health monitoring technologies","People":"Patients with COVID-19 symptoms, healthcare personnel","Owner":"Healthcare providers, device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Inadequate data validation leading to false alarms or missed critical symptoms","Impact":"Incorrect assessment of patient condition and unnecessary burden on healthcare resources","Mitigation":"Integration of data validation algorithms, periodic validation through in-person visits","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics, machine learning algorithms","People":"Patients with COVID-19 symptoms, healthcare personnel","Owner":"Healthcare providers, device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Overreliance on technology for diagnosis and assessment","Impact":"Delay in necessary medical interventions and potential misdiagnosis","Mitigation":"Emphasizing the complementary role of technology and in-person medical assessments","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote consultation tools","People":"Patients with COVID-19 symptoms, healthcare personnel","Owner":"Healthcare providers"}]}
